Our Products

Paddy Rice

Our paddy rice is of the highest quality with our moisture content regularly at 14% which is perfect for milling or to be used as seedlings. We maintain the highest standards to ensure purity and is devoid of stones, chaff, weeds and stalk. they are stored properly to protect from fluctuating temperature and moisture to avoid fissures and cracks. Our grains are harvested at the right time so high yield and quality is maintained.

Milled Rice

Our milled and bagged rice meet and exceed market requirements. With quality traits such as color, cleanliness, purity, grain shape and size, uniformity of size and shape, satisfaction is guaranteed as we deal in wholesale and retail, able to supply in commercial quantities accross the country.

Sesame Seeds

Our sesame seeds are of the highest quality, we can supply both hulled and unhulled seeds in commercial quantity. These can be used for various purposes like baking and oil extraction.

Our Services

Business Plans

Just as a builder uses a blueprint to ensure that a building will be structurally sound, the process of creating and writing a blueprint for your business -- called a business plan -- will help you determine whether your business will be strong from the start. Without a business plan, you leave far too many things to chance. Speak with our business developers who have vast experience in successful agricultural ventures for a business plan customized specially for you.

Crop Consulting

we can help your farm improve on its overall yield and quality of crops. By using proven methods such as pest management and fertilizer use, we wil help make your farm achieve its full potential. Our team of highly trained field officers carry out farm visits to ensure that all risks are identified and dealt with throughout the season.
